1.0.1.name: connect20/Zippy_Lightbox
1.0.1.description: This little extension will install the lightbox effect on product images at the Product Details page. No coding experience needed. Possible customisation options can be found at the configuration page.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
